clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in soft tissue of thigh with SUVmax 6.25.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Focal uptake in soft tissue of thigh consistent with post-surgical changes.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in soft tissue of thigh, suggestive of malignancy.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
